item.title: Brian Glenn reveals engagement to Rep Marjorie Taylor Greene: 'She said 'yes''
item.description: White House correspondent Brian Glenn indicated in a post on X that he and Republican Rep. Marjorie Taylor Greene of Georgia have gotten engaged.

item.title: ‘Ghost ships’ ferrying illicit oil have sailed into Trump’s crosshairs
item.description: Secret fleet of oil tankers uses fake flags, shell companies and disabled tracking to smuggle crude from Russia, Iran and Venezuela despite sanctions.

item.title: Pentagon launches full command investigation into Sen. Mark Kelly over ‘serious misconduct’ allegations
item.description: Pentagon escalates investigation into Sen. Mark Kelly over misconduct allegations related to video urging troops to refuse illegal orders from command...

item.title: Ilhan Omar lashes out at 'sick' Republicans for investigating her alleged marriage to brother
item.description: Rep. Ilhan Omar dismisses questions about alleged brother marriage as ‘sick’ attacks, while Trump border czar Tom Homan signals that documents related...

item.title: DHS arrests 'worst of the worst' illegal migrants, including murderers and pedophiles, in weekend operation
item.description: ICE arrests 17 illegal migrants convicted of murder, sexual exploitation of minors, and other serious crimes during weekend operations across the U.S.
